system.description:
Cursed wrist-guards which seem to grant the wearer protection as if they were wearing armour, but actually render them defenceless.

  • When initially worn: The bracers grant an AC of 5 [14], as long as the character wears no armour.

  • Dangerous combat: Once the wearer is in a dangerous combat situation, the bracers’ curse activates.

  • Curse of defencelessness: Once the curse is activated, the wearer’s AC is 9 [10]. Any bonuses due to DEX or other magical protections are negated.

  • Removing: Once the curse is active, the character cannot remove the bracers. The curse can only be removed by magic (e.g. @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.spells.Item.zXFADd6L1nzS6uzq]{remove curse}).
